channel.title: VPS Run.bat problem - FIXED PLZ LOCK
channel.description:
Ok, if got my VPS from VPSland.com, and downloaded JDK and all other shit u need to do (changing ur NO-IP ect...) I click on Run and that works fine... it say's Server is online... i check the server status on a site and it say's ONLINE!
When i click on logg of administrator (what u got to do if u wanne get back to normal pc..) and then i check the status agien and it say's OFFLINE... i try to log in and i got the error: Cant Connect To Server.
I go back to my VPS and i see that the Run screen is gone...
HELP PLZ

item.title: VPS Run.bat problem - FIXED PLZ LOCK
item.dc:creator: @kelly15 kelly15
item.description:
@kelly15 wrote:

try this
@echo off
title pk-revolution
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
item.source: VPS Run.bat problem - FIXED PLZ LOCK

@echo off title pk-revolution java -Xmx400m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Try that

item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

mich702703:

i re-downlaoded my files started everything (server works fine) but when i logg off… the server shut’s down!

Like, when you log off your computer?
Try conslating the people you paid it with,
It may be a minor bug.

Read full topic
